courses.title: Javascript Fundamentals
courses.description: This JavaScript crash course covers the basics of programming through advanced topics like asynchronous requests and promises. The most used developer tools and libraries for Ethereum are JavaScript based, making it a key foundation to web3 development.
courses.activities: Each week will have interactive coding challenges, videos, and tutorials.
courses.details: This course gets you running with coding in one of the most popular programming languages in the world. Great start prior to taking the bootcamp.

courses.title: Ethereum Developer Bootcamp
courses.description: The Ethereum Developer Bootcamp is a comprehensive course that teaches you the fundamentals of web3 development. The course includes everything from typography to smart contracts to fully functional dApp development. This is the #1 resource to jumpstart your web3 career.
courses.activities: Content is released on a weakly basis with live sessions, interactive coding challenges, videos, guides and weekly projects
courses.details: This course gets you running with coding in one of the most popular programming languages in the world. Great start prior to taking the bootcamp.

curriculum.courseWork: Mastering solidity: events, security and data
Build the future: identify,  voting, exchanges and wallets

courses.title: Road to web3
courses.description: In this self-paced, 10 project course, you'll learn from industry experts on the cutting edge of web3, meet fellow developers, supercharge your skills through real-world applications, and mint Proof-of-Knowledge NFTs.
courses.activities: Projects increase in difficulty and include video and written tutorials for the most relevant web3 use-cases, and rewarded you with coveted NFTs.
courses.details: This course gets you running with coding in one of the most popular programming languages in the world. Great start prior to taking the bootcamp.

curriculum.courseWork: Connect APIs to your smart contract
